    DT, DL, DD Tags:

    HTML:
    HTML Hypertext Markup Language, a standardized system for tagging text files to achieve font, colour, graphic, and hyperlink effects on World Wide Web pages.
    CSS:
    CSS is the acronym of Abbr tag: CSS. CSS is a computer language for laying out and structuring web pages (HTML or XML). This language contains coding elements and i s composed of these “cascading style sheets” which are equally called CSS files
